description: This is a powerful tool which let's you Normalize your CSV table into 1NF form. Just load the CSV and select the columns you want to unpivot.
title: CSV Normalizer

description: This tool lets the user to load image_urls in a row format.
title: Image URL Viewer

description: This tool allows the user to load image URLs on a webpage and shows the Image Number and Image Resolution for each image.
title: UPLOAD Check

description: This tool allows the user to play a list of video on one single webpage.
title: Video Viewer

description: This tool allows the user to play a list of images as a video...
title: Image As Video Player

description: This tool allows annotation on sports frames and let the user to download the CSV of the judgements given by the user.
title: Sports Annotator

description: This tool allows annotation on images by given by the user where the user can also give the list of options as well separated by line break.
title: Custom Image Annotator

description: This tool allows the user to distribute the slots to upload to the uploaders specificed by the user given the total sum is equal for both the tables only then the user would be able to click on the Allocate button.
title: ID Slot Distribution
